data.Name: Ramez Naam
data.About:
Solar power, wind power, energy storage, and electric autonomous vehicles on on their way to disrupting the $6 Trillion energy industry. Globally, they’re receiving $250 Billion in investment per year.

–
As the price of solar, wind, and storage plunge, they become increasingly attractive – and increasingly disruptive to the existing industry.

–
I invest in early stage startups that are part of this transition. I lead syndicates where other accredited investors can invest alongside me. These startups are high-risk, high-reward. Many – even most – will not return the capital invested in them. Others may return 10x, 100x, or more.

–
If you’re a startup seeking investment, or an accredited investor interested in co-investing, please contact me.
